summary: Persistent Pixel Artifact Follows Player Character in Lobby
description: Upon loading into the intro room, a large pixelated square artifact appears behind the player character. The artifact persists during movement, scene transitions, and interaction within the lobby. The effect appears in every session.
steps: 1. Launch the game through the Steam client.
2. Move around the intro room using [W][A][S][D].
3. Observe a pixel square artifact consistently positioned behind the player.
expected: No unintended visual overlays or artifacts should appear behind the player. Scene rendering should remain clean and consistent.
actual: A persistent pixelated square appears behind the player and follows them across multiple rooms and transitions.
